t: Amazon Warehousing and Distribution
s: Amazon Warehousing and Distribution (AWD) is a low-cost bulk storage solution that distributes your inventory to the Amazon store and non-Amazon sales channels. AWD pricing covers FBA inbound placement, so there is no separate charge for this service.
